channel.title: Sorry bout this
channel.description:
Hey guys, I know I just posted something about this, but now I have a little more info :\ so whenever I where the cape, my player goes in front of it, like in this picture.
[img]http://oi39.tinypic.com/oqddu1.jpg[/img]
here's the front view
[img]http://oi41.tinypic.com/343lojs.jpg[/img]
And heres the side view, (I made it so far away just so you can see that it's not how close the cape is in the model thats the prob.)
[img]http://oi41.tinypic.com/104428l.jpg[/img]
Hope someone can help me out some :(

item.title: Sorry bout this
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

Most likely is the item definitions of the model.

Read full topic
